tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_sequences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sequence TEXT NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE genes (id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_name VARCHAR(50), sequence TEXT);
CREATE TABLE mutations (id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT, mutation_type VARCHAR(50), mutation_description TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES genes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE);

CREATE TABLE genetic_sequences (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sequence_annotations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence_id INT,
  annotation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sequence_matches (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  query_sequence_id INT,
  matched_sequence_id INT,
  similarity_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT,
  email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE mutations (
    mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT,
    protein_id INT,
    mutation_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    effect VARCHAR(255)
);
